definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Some courts use anonymous juries, meaning that jurors are identified only by number.
sentences.chinese: 一些法院採用匿名陪審團，即用數字代號標識陪審員。

sentences.english: The plan for this operation was coded "Overlord".
Built in 1938, the top-secret bunker was codenamed Paddock.
sentences.chinese: 建於1938年的最高機密地下堡壘代號“圍場”。

sentences.english: Abstract:The flying songs of Miao nationality have become one kind of code name and symbol of Miao nationality music.
sentences.chinese: 苗族飛歌成了苗族音樂的一種代號和象徵。

sentences.english: He rents out this 154-foot mega yacht called Mr. Terrible.
sentences.chinese: 他出租了154英尺寬，代號“恐怖者”的巨型遊艇。

sentences.english: The system is highly advanced. It has been code named Long Tooth by the Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 整個系統非常先進，五角大樓給它的代號是‘長牙’。

sentences.english: Shipped to some theaters with the codename 'Hidden from Earth'.
sentences.chinese: 電影被運往一些影院的時候用的是代號“藏於地下”。

sentences.english: Year manufactured products, code-named factory should be in accordance with the provisions of the design department.
sentences.chinese: 製造年分代號應符合製造廠產品設計部門的規定。

sentences.english: The other life is lived in computers where you go by hacker alias "Neo".
sentences.chinese: 另一個你活在電腦中，使用的黑客代號是尼奧。

sentences.english: The iPad -- code named K48 -- was unveiled four months later.
sentences.chinese: 4個月後，蘋果發佈了iPad，其代號正是K48。

sentences.english: Write the letters[a-b]in the correct boxes above.
sentences.chinese: 並把下面的字母代號寫在上面的方框中。

sentences.english: which is called two seventy-five, which is Precision Machine Design.
sentences.chinese: 它的代號爲275，全名叫精密儀器設計。

sentences.english: After forty, I dubbed myself as "No Mention of Love" in the Internet chat-room.
sentences.chinese: 四十歲之後，我在聊天室裏的代號叫“不談愛情”。

sentences.english: Fuqing class is the name given by NATO to the the PLA Navy's first replenishment oilers.
sentences.chinese: 福清級是北約對PLA海軍第一艘再補給油船的代號。

sentences.english: Repeat the previous step for each stock symbol in the table.
sentences.chinese: 爲表格中的每個股票代號重複以前的步驟。

sentences.english: For Okamura, his code name is Joel.
sentences.chinese: 對於岡村，他的代號是，利喬。

definition: to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
sudden and violent attack/assault/fig. rushed job/concentrated effort to finish a job quickly
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
